segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is almost mesmerizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesnâ€™t seem to notice the puddle forming around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so sneaky, reaching for those cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is balancing on that stool, determined to get his treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes the whole scene feel warm and cozy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost smell the cookies from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting, but the chaos inside is more interesting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this moment captures childhood perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR
